title: Drupal security advisory (AV25-204)
description: On April 9, 2025, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: ECA : Event - Condition - Action  versions 1.2.x, versions prior to 1.1.12, version 2.0.0 to versions prior to 2.0.16 and version 2.1.0 to versions prior to 2.1.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
